text: and so it's my pleasure to introduce the

we had a lot of difficulties working

Data and a lot more
we don't even need to build custom

Johnson and Johnson has led the world in

serving patients doctors and nurses for
over 130 years as data volume grew we
started facing challenges with scaling
and cost with Legacy tools and Hardware
as well as tight coupling between
storage and compute we needed a scalable

compute and storage separation and easy

growth and drive Innovation Amazon
redshifts Evolution over the years such
as Spectrum ra3b storage compute
separation data sharing AIML
capabilities and more solved our

managed data warehouse
this helped to reduce our operating cost
by 30 improved time to delivery by 50
while handling 20 times growth in our

redshift has been a game changer for the

process exabytes of data daily
reinvent analytics with Amazon redshift
